let fs = require('fs')
const PATH = process.platform === 'linux' ? '/dev/stdin' : 'testcase.txt'
const N = +(fs.readFileSync(PATH).toString().trim())

function hanoi(N, start, end, via) {
  if (N === 1) return `${start} ${end}\n`

}
